appetizers.name: nachos
appetizers.description: A delicious melted dish which is a favorite American pasttime appetizer to enjoy while watching any sports game.

appetizers.name: chickenwings
appetizers.description: Smothered in delicious spices and painted with a spicy sweet sauce, these chicken wings will make your mouth water.

appetizers.name: artichoke dip
appetizers.desrciption: A beautifully creamy blend of peppers, artichokes, and cheese to dip your nachos into.

cold sandwiches.name: turkey club
cold sandwiches.description: Cold cut sandwich consisting of meat and cheese, that is eaten with a crisp pickle for good measure .

cold sandwiches.name: BLT
cold sandwiches.desrciption: A cold cut sub on white bread, traditional bacon, lettuce, mayo, and tomatoe

cold sandwiches.name: Billy Club
ingredients: 2 portions of prime cut roast beef
cold sandwiches.desrciption: Classic club with only meat ,cheese, and a healthy serving of mustard

hot sandwiches.name: grilled cheese
hot sandwiches.desrciption: A hot sandwich grilled on top of the stove slathered in butter to give a golden brown crispy texture on the outside, and melted cheese on the inside

hot sandwiches.name: egg sandwhich
hot sandwiches.desrciption: 3 eggs cooked sunny side up smothered with cheese, mayo, and mustard on a sesame toast

hot sandwiches.name: reuben
hot sandwiches.desrciption: Delicious isish style cooked corn beef smothered with sourcout and onions on a freshly baked rye bun with house secret dipping sauce on the side
